name: mj-crm
description: git add server/controllers/ git add server/routes/ git add server/utils/ git add server/Docs.md git commit -m " made and tested, Controller and Routes, For createUser And Login Also Added Docs" git push

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client && npm i --legacy-peer-deps
